sub_fields.label: Financing Headline
sub_fields.name: financing_headline
sub_fields.default_value: Financing

sub_fields.label: Financing Copy
sub_fields.name: financing_copy
sub_fields.default_value: We have been financing used trucks and trailers for owner-operators and small fleets since 1997. Our staff is highly skilled at understanding what is needed from their lender in order to achieve success in your business, which is why we are proud to offer the easiest financing application in the industry. Complete and submit our secure credit application. Once submitted, an Arrow representative will reach out to complete the process.

sub_fields.label: Warranties Headline
sub_fields.name: warranties_headline
sub_fields.default_value: Warranties

sub_fields.label: Warranties Copy
sub_fields.name: warranties_copy
sub_fields.default_value:
EXTENDED WARRANTIES

Protect your investment against failure from wear-out for up to 4 years or 400,000 miles. Unlike other used truck warranties in the marketplace, Arrow's warranties include full coverage (not just major components) during the entire coverage period.

We have class 8 coverage plans ranging from 6 months/50k miles to 48 months/400k miles and fit almost any need and budget. We also offer optional upgrades on transmission and rear axle parts coverage. View a full list of covered components here.

If you experience a problem or breakdown on the road, your claim can be made 24 hours a day, seven days a week. Arrangements are made and you are informed of what immediate action to take. All paperwork and direct payments are made to the repair facility within hours. You make one call and repairs can be made at more than 3,000 recognized repair facilities. We only repair at authorized OEM facilities and use genuine OEM parts for repairs. You have one deductible and your liability for mechanical failure is only $150 per occurrence (subject to change).

AFTERTREATMENT WARRANTY

We've added the most comprehensive aftertreatment warranty in the industry to our already extensive list of warranty offerings. Unlike some of our competitors, our warranty includes all engine models and includes coverage on 42 vital system components for light, medium and heavy-duty diesel engines. We have plans available for 12, 24, 36 and 48 months. View covered components and sensors.

ConfidencePLUS WARRANTY

Arrow's exclusive 90 day/25k mile comprehensive coverage is standard on virtually every late-model truck we sell at no cost to you.

sub_fields.label: Insurance and Protection Headline
sub_fields.name: insurance_and_protection_headline
sub_fields.default_value: Insurance and Protection

sub_fields.label: Insurance and Protection Copy
sub_fields.name: insurance_and_protection_copy
sub_fields.default_value:
Insurance

Your truck is your livelihood and your investment. Do you have enough available cash to replace your truck if it were damaged, non-drivable or totaled? Are you protected if you cause property damage or bodily injury to others while you're driving without hauling a load? Learn more here and give me a call with any further questions you may have.

Gap Protection

Did you know that if you suffer the total loss or unrecovered theft of your truck, your insurance company will only pay the actual cash value of your truck, which may not be enough to pay off your remaining loan balance? Arrow's Gap Protection covers the difference so you won't still owe money on an asset that no longer exists.

Example of Gap Protection

Debt Waiver

With Arrow's Debt Waiver program your family won't have to face the burden of a loan balance on your truck in the event of your death. Protect your family's financial security by canceling any remaining balance on your loan and releases full ownership of your truck to your family, with no further financial strain. The cost of the waiver is only pennies per day and may be added to your loan balance and included in your monthly payment. No medical exam is required and the program has very few limitations. Give me a call and we can discuss the details!

sub_fields.label: Emergency Services Headline
sub_fields.name: emergency_services_headline
sub_fields.default_value: Emergency Services

sub_fields.label: Emergency Services Copy
sub_fields.name: emergency_services_copy
sub_fields.default_value:
24/7 Roadside Assistance

Arrow offers 24/7 roadside assistance to everyone regardless of when or where you purchased your commercial vehicle. Our service provider, RoadsideMASTERS.com, networks with reputable contractors across the US and Canada who won't capitalize on your situation by charging excessive parts costs and labor rates. Plus, you'll receive the quality service you need in the event of a roadside breakdown. RoadsideMASTERS.com uses the latest technology for efficiency and quality. Their GPS technology solution ensures the most qualified provider is dispatched to a breakdown location via a text message link that allows the system to pinpoint your location in seconds.

  • View a list of all covered benefits
  • Download the membership handbook

Arrow Action Services

When problems arise, you want a solution that is, cost effective, responsive and minimizes any unwanted downtime. Arrow Action Services (AAS) is an emergency assistance program that delivers round-the-clock peace-of-mind throughout the United States and Canada. Think of AAS as your personal concierge service. From locating a qualified service provider, to arranging hotel accommodations, we do everything possible to help you – and your load – reach your destination…ON TIME. Learn more here or give me a call with any further questions you may have.

sub_fields.label: Welcome Headline
sub_fields.name: welcome_headline
sub_fields.default_value: Welcome to the Arrow family.

sub_fields.label: Welcome Copy
sub_fields.name: welcome_copy
sub_fields.default_value: Thank you for the opportunity to serve you, we truly appreciate your business. We feel that customer service should extend after the sale, so I've compiled some information you might find useful after your truck purchase. Please don't hesitate to reach out if there's anything else you need.
